urls.description: - XConfessions is back in Berlin with an exclusive LUST LUST LUST party at Monster Ronsons - hosted by POPPERS ⭑DANCE MUSIC DRAG SHOW⭑ Directors Erika Lust (@erikalustfilms) and Matt Lambert (@dielamb) will meet & greet the audience celebrating the beauty of XConfessions' films and a special premiere of Klappe - with - POPPERs SHOW - DJ's - PORN CABINS - GOGO DANCERS - ⭑Lineup TBA... ⭑ 20.00 Doors ⭑ 22.30 Show ⭑ PORN all night 12€/15€

tweets.text: Save the date! Join us on October 27th for a chance to meet founder @erikalustfilms and the director of our latest release ‘Klappe’ @dielamb alongside fab queer local artists (+ more special guests to be announced soon 👀) https://t.co/V6XsBSXyPf

In addition to our films being screened and our pitching session at the festival, this year XConfessions is back in Berlin with an exclusive LUST LUST LUST party at @monsterronsons with booths screening our films all night long 🔥 https://t.co/1xWwRSskYs
The countdown has started for the @pff_berlin -- the go-to place for the lovers of independent adult cinema. And this year is going to be a very special one! https://t.co/DsUPoNHlEp

Our latest film ‘Klappe’ combines “romance, humanism, intimacy and cinema” in an effort to break the taboo that surrounds bathroom sex at nightclubs in Berlin. Directed by @dielamb and starring @billy_vegaxxx,  @pierrerubberax, #Tiresia, #KaidenFord and #Cain ❤️‍🔥 https://t.co/RCS5fruM0n
Send your short film pitch to rebecca@erikalustfilms.com before October 14th with the subject line "BPFF PITCH - Your film title"
Develop a pitch that includes: a synopsis of the story with an explicit scene❤️‍🔥, a script (not mandatory), a reference moodboard, a draft budget and links to your crew.
Dreaming of creating a short film about your deepest sexual fantasy and having us finance it and produce it? 👇🏼 https://t.co/8IroTRQOKl
Tonight is the exclusive premiere of our newest release on @xconfessions: “La Journée des Framboises” https://t.co/3yoo51erSO

"I used to spend every morning writing and drawing in the café beside my place, looking quietly at the people sipping their coffee or gazing out of the window. I thought – this is the café where the dreamers go. One day, there was a girl I had never seen before..." https://t.co/ekiDpqWpuR
